replies.body: Do any of you even main {{champion:44}} ?

i played a fair bit of him right before he got reworked, and right after he got reworked, but I've been focussing on other supports now. I got rid of the club soon after he got reworked because he isn't really a gem knight anymore, and there was only 3 of us I think
sign me up for this truly outrageous club, message me on saturday.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{champion:44}}
